name: @mizarjp/yaneuraou
description: YaneuraOu is the World's Strongest Shogi engine(AI player) , WCSC29 1st winner , educational and USI compliant engine.

scripts.build: npm run-script halfkp && npm run-script k-p && npm run-script halfkp.noeval && npm run-script halfkpe9.noeval && npm run-script halfkpvm.noeval && npm run-script k-p.noeval && npm run-script material && npm run-script material9
scripts.eval:halfkp: if [ ! -s .dl/suisho5_20211123.halfkp.nnue.cpp.gz ]; then curl --create-dirs -RLo .dl/suisho5_20211123.halfkp.nnue.cpp.gz https://github.com/mizar/YaneuraOu/releases/download/resource/suisho5_20211123.halfkp.nnue.cpp.gz ; fi && gzip -cd .dl/suisho5_20211123.halfkp.nnue.cpp.gz > source/eval/nnue/embedded_nnue.cpp
scripts.eval:k-p: if [ ! -s .dl/suishopetite_20211123.k_p.nnue.cpp.gz ]; then curl --create-dirs -RLo .dl/suishopetite_20211123.k_p.nnue.cpp.gz https://github.com/mizar/YaneuraOu/releases/download/resource/suishopetite_20211123.k_p.nnue.cpp.gz ; fi && gzip -cd .dl/suishopetite_20211123.k_p.nnue.cpp.gz > source/eval/nnue/embedded_nnue.cpp
scripts.halfkp: npm run-script eval:halfkp && cd source && make -j$(nproc) clean tournament YANEURAOU_EDITION=YANEURAOU_ENGINE_NNUE TARGET=yaneuraou.halfkp.js EM_EXPORT_NAME=YaneuraOu_HalfKP ENGINE_NAME=Suisho5+YaneuraOu COMPILER=em++ TARGET_CPU=WASM EVAL_EMBEDDING=ON EM_INITIAL_MEMORY_SIZE=100663296 EXTRA_CPPFLAGS='-DENGINE_OPTIONS=\""option=name=FV_SCALE=type=spin=default=24=min=1=max=128\""' && gzip -9kf yaneuraou*.js yaneuraou*.wasm && find yaneuraou*.js yaneuraou*.wasm -type f | xargs node ../script/brotli_compress.js && cd .. && mkdir -p ./npmpackages/yaneuraou.halfkp/lib/ && cp source/yaneuraou*.js source/yaneuraou*.js.gz source/yaneuraou*.js.br source/yaneuraou*.wasm source/yaneuraou*.wasm.gz source/yaneuraou*.wasm.br public/ && mv source/yaneuraou*.js source/yaneuraou*.js.gz source/yaneuraou*.js.br source/yaneuraou*.wasm source/yaneuraou*.wasm.gz source/yaneuraou*.wasm.br ./npmpackages/yaneuraou.halfkp/lib/
scripts.k-p: npm run-script eval:k-p && cd source && make -j$(nproc) clean tournament YANEURAOU_EDITION=YANEURAOU_ENGINE_NNUE_KP256 TARGET=yaneuraou.k-p.js EM_EXPORT_NAME=YaneuraOu_K_P COMPILER=em++ TARGET_CPU=WASM EVAL_EMBEDDING=ON EM_INITIAL_MEMORY_SIZE=25165824 EXTRA_CPPFLAGS='-DENGINE_OPTIONS=\""option=name=FV_SCALE=type=spin=default=24=min=1=max=128\""' && gzip -9kf yaneuraou*.js yaneuraou*.wasm && find yaneuraou*.js yaneuraou*.wasm -type f | xargs node ../script/brotli_compress.js && cd .. && mkdir -p ./npmpackages/yaneuraou.k-p/lib/ && cp source/yaneuraou*.js source/yaneuraou*.js.gz source/yaneuraou*.js.br source/yaneuraou*.wasm source/yaneuraou*.wasm.gz source/yaneuraou*.wasm.br public/ && mv source/yaneuraou*.js source/yaneuraou*.js.gz source/yaneuraou*.js.br source/yaneuraou*.wasm source/yaneuraou*.wasm.gz source/yaneuraou*.wasm.br ./npmpackages/yaneuraou.k-p/lib/
scripts.halfkp.noeval: cd source && make -j$(nproc) clean tournament YANEURAOU_EDITION=YANEURAOU_ENGINE_NNUE TARGET=yaneuraou.halfkp.noeval.js EM_EXPORT_NAME=YaneuraOu_HalfKP_noeval COMPILER=em++ TARGET_CPU=WASM EM_INITIAL_MEMORY_SIZE=100663296 && gzip -9kf yaneuraou*.js yaneuraou*.wasm && find yaneuraou*.js yaneuraou*.wasm -type f | xargs node ../script/brotli_compress.js && cd .. && mkdir -p ./npmpackages/yaneuraou.halfkp.noeval/lib/ && cp source/yaneuraou*.js source/yaneuraou*.js.gz source/yaneuraou*.js.br source/yaneuraou*.wasm source/yaneuraou*.wasm.gz source/yaneuraou*.wasm.br public/ && mv source/yaneuraou*.js source/yaneuraou*.js.gz source/yaneuraou*.js.br source/yaneuraou*.wasm source/yaneuraou*.wasm.gz source/yaneuraou*.wasm.br ./npmpackages/yaneuraou.halfkp.noeval/lib/
scripts.halfkpe9.noeval: cd source && make -j$(nproc) clean tournament YANEURAOU_EDITION=YANEURAOU_ENGINE_NNUE_HALFKPE9 TARGET=yaneuraou.halfkpe9.noeval.js EM_EXPORT_NAME=YaneuraOu_HalfKPE9_noeval COMPILER=em++ TARGET_CPU=WASM EM_INITIAL_MEMORY_SIZE=100663296 && gzip -9kf yaneuraou*.js yaneuraou*.wasm && find yaneuraou*.js yaneuraou*.wasm -type f | xargs node ../script/brotli_compress.js && cd .. && mkdir -p ./npmpackages/yaneuraou.halfkpe9.noeval/lib/ && cp source/yaneuraou*.js source/yaneuraou*.js.gz source/yaneuraou*.js.br source/yaneuraou*.wasm source/yaneuraou*.wasm.gz source/yaneuraou*.wasm.br public/ && mv source/yaneuraou*.js source/yaneuraou*.js.gz source/yaneuraou*.js.br source/yaneuraou*.wasm source/yaneuraou*.wasm.gz source/yaneuraou*.wasm.br ./npmpackages/yaneuraou.halfkpe9.noeval/lib/
scripts.halfkpvm.noeval: cd source && make -j$(nproc) clean tournament YANEURAOU_EDITION=YANEURAOU_ENGINE_NNUE_HALFKP_VM_256X2_32_32 TARGET=yaneuraou.halfkpvm.noeval.js EM_EXPORT_NAME=YaneuraOu_HalfKPvm_noeval COMPILER=em++ TARGET_CPU=WASM EM_INITIAL_MEMORY_SIZE=100663296 && gzip -9kf yaneuraou*.js yaneuraou*.wasm && find yaneuraou*.js yaneuraou*.wasm -type f | xargs node ../script/brotli_compress.js && cd .. && mkdir -p ./npmpackages/yaneuraou.halfkpvm.noeval/lib/ && cp source/yaneuraou*.js source/yaneuraou*.js.gz source/yaneuraou*.js.br source/yaneuraou*.wasm source/yaneuraou*.wasm.gz source/yaneuraou*.wasm.br public/ && mv source/yaneuraou*.js source/yaneuraou*.js.gz source/yaneuraou*.js.br source/yaneuraou*.wasm source/yaneuraou*.wasm.gz source/yaneuraou*.wasm.br ./npmpackages/yaneuraou.halfkpvm.noeval/lib/
scripts.k-p.noeval: cd source && make -j$(nproc) clean tournament YANEURAOU_EDITION=YANEURAOU_ENGINE_NNUE_KP256 TARGET=yaneuraou.k-p.noeval.js EM_EXPORT_NAME=YaneuraOu_K_P_noeval COMPILER=em++ TARGET_CPU=WASM EM_INITIAL_MEMORY_SIZE=25165824 && gzip -9kf yaneuraou*.js yaneuraou*.wasm && find yaneuraou*.js yaneuraou*.wasm -type f | xargs node ../script/brotli_compress.js && cd .. && mkdir -p ./npmpackages/yaneuraou.k-p.noeval/lib/ && cp source/yaneuraou*.js source/yaneuraou*.js.gz source/yaneuraou*.js.br source/yaneuraou*.wasm source/yaneuraou*.wasm.gz source/yaneuraou*.wasm.br public/ && mv source/yaneuraou*.js source/yaneuraou*.js.gz source/yaneuraou*.js.br source/yaneuraou*.wasm source/yaneuraou*.wasm.gz source/yaneuraou*.wasm.br ./npmpackages/yaneuraou.k-p.noeval/lib/
scripts.material: cd source && make -j$(nproc) clean tournament YANEURAOU_EDITION=YANEURAOU_ENGINE_MATERIAL MATERIAL_LEVEL=1 TARGET=yaneuraou.material.js EM_EXPORT_NAME=YaneuraOu_Material COMPILER=em++ TARGET_CPU=WASM EM_INITIAL_MEMORY_SIZE=25165824 EXTRA_CPPFLAGS='-DENGINE_OPTIONS=\""option=name=BookFile=type=combo=default=no_book=var=no_book=var=standard_book.db=var=yaneura_book1.db=var=yaneura_book2.db=var=yaneura_book3.db=var=yaneura_book4.db=var=user_book1.db=var=user_book2.db=var=user_book3.db=var=book.bin\""' && gzip -9kf yaneuraou*.js yaneuraou*.wasm && find yaneuraou*.js yaneuraou*.wasm -type f | xargs node ../script/brotli_compress.js && cd .. && mkdir -p ./npmpackages/yaneuraou.material/lib/ && cp source/yaneuraou*.js source/yaneuraou*.js.gz source/yaneuraou*.js.br source/yaneuraou*.wasm source/yaneuraou*.wasm.gz source/yaneuraou*.wasm.br public/ && mv source/yaneuraou*.js source/yaneuraou*.js.gz source/yaneuraou*.js.br source/yaneuraou*.wasm source/yaneuraou*.wasm.gz source/yaneuraou*.wasm.br ./npmpackages/yaneuraou.material/lib/
scripts.material9: cd source && make -j$(nproc) clean tournament YANEURAOU_EDITION=YANEURAOU_ENGINE_MATERIAL MATERIAL_LEVEL=9 TARGET=yaneuraou.material9.js EM_EXPORT_NAME=YaneuraOu_Material9 COMPILER=em++ TARGET_CPU=WASM EM_INITIAL_MEMORY_SIZE=335544320 EXTRA_CPPFLAGS='-DENGINE_OPTIONS=\""option=name=BookFile=type=combo=default=no_book=var=no_book=var=standard_book.db=var=yaneura_book1.db=var=yaneura_book2.db=var=yaneura_book3.db=var=yaneura_book4.db=var=user_book1.db=var=user_book2.db=var=user_book3.db=var=book.bin\""' && gzip -9kf yaneuraou*.js yaneuraou*.wasm && find yaneuraou*.js yaneuraou*.wasm -type f | xargs node ../script/brotli_compress.js && cd .. && mkdir -p ./npmpackages/yaneuraou.material9/lib/ && cp source/yaneuraou*.js source/yaneuraou*.js.gz source/yaneuraou*.js.br source/yaneuraou*.wasm source/yaneuraou*.wasm.gz source/yaneuraou*.wasm.br public/ && mv source/yaneuraou*.js source/yaneuraou*.js.gz source/yaneuraou*.js.br source/yaneuraou*.wasm source/yaneuraou*.wasm.gz source/yaneuraou*.wasm.br ./npmpackages/yaneuraou.material9/lib/
